name: listDatasets_1
description: Returns a list of datasets and their labels that were created by the current user. The response is sorted by dataset ID.

offset.description: Index of the dataset from which you want to start paging

count.description: Number of datsets to return. Maximum valid value is 25. If you specify a number greater than 25, the call returns 25 datasets.

global.description: If true, returns all global datasets. Global datasets are public datasets that Salesforce provides.
